Achievements.name: Identity, Destiny
Achievements.description: Have all pieces in the queue be the exact same piece

Achievements.name: Thousand Cuts
Achievements.description: Eliminate a total of 1000 blocks in the same game without quitting it

Achievements.name: Perfect Fit
Achievements.description: Have a piece in queue that perfectly fits an empty slot in the game board

Achievements.name: All Perfect Fit
Achievements.description: Have all pieces in queue fitting empty slots in the game board

Achievements.name: Rainbow
Achievements.description: Have blocks of all colors present in the game board at the same time

Achievements.name: In the Dark
Achievements.description: Switch to dark theme in theme settings

Achievements.name: Pale as Snow
Achievements.description: Switch to white theme in theme settings

Achievements.name: Welcome Aboard
Achievements.description: Log in to your account

Achievements.name: Go Automatic
Achievements.description: Activate autoplay feature in any game mode

Achievements.name: God's Invite
Achievements.description: Activate God Mode through a log in Easter Egg

Achievements.name: Devil's Invite
Achievements.description: Activate Devil Mode through a log in Easter Egg

Achievements.name: Game On
Achievements.description: Complete a full game in any game mode

Achievements.name: ChappyHex
Achievements.description: How the game core was originally written

Achievements.name: Sweet Home
Achievements.description: Quit the game before the 20th turn

Achievements.name: Come On!
Achievements.description: Quit the game immediately after the first move

Achievements.name: Zero Footprint
Achievements.description: Quit the game before the first move

Achievements.name: SadHex
Achievements.description: Terminate the game before the 20th turn in any game mode

Achievements.name: I've got something
Achievements.description: Achieve 10 turns and score of 36 in any game

Achievements.name: In my 20s
Achievements.description: Achieve 20 turns and score of 72 in any game

Achievements.name: One Hundred
Achievements.description: Achieve 100 turns and score of 400 in any game

Achievements.name: Four Digits
Achievements.description: Achieve 270 turns and score of 1000 in any game

Achievements.name: One Thousand
Achievements.description: Achieve 1000 turns and score of 4000 in any game

Achievements.name: Let's go for 10K
Achievements.description: Achieve 10000 turns and score of 40000 in any game

Achievements.name: I Am Legend
Achievements.description: Achieve 100000 turns and score of 400000 in any game

Achievements.name: Millionaire
Achievements.description: Achieve 1 million turns and score of 4 million in any game

Achievements.name: The Prophesy
Achievements.description: Achieve 10 million turns and score of 40 million in any game

Achievements.name: The HexaGod
Achievements.description: Achieve 100 million turns and score of 400 million in any game

Achievements.name: Overflow Risk
Achievements.description: Achieve 400 million turns and score of 1.6 billion in any game

Achievements.name: Billionaire
Achievements.description: Achieve a billion turns and score of a billion in any game

Achievements.name: Trio
Achievements.description: Have a set of three line pieces in the queue at the same time

Achievements.name: Strange Stable Sign
Achievements.description: Have a set of four triangular pieces in the queue at the same time

Achievements.name: Rhombus Bus
Achievements.description: Have a set of three rhombus in the queue at the same time

Achievements.name: Big Block Party
Achievements.description: Have three big blocks in the queue at the same time

Achievements.name: I'm a big fan of this
Achievements.description: Have two of each of the two fan pieces in the queue at the same time

Achievements.name: Eliminate!
Achievements.description: Eliminate at least one line in a game

Achievements.name: It's All Gone
Achievements.description: Eliminate more than 10 blocks in a game

Achievements.name: Power Cross
Achievements.description: Eliminate the same block in two directions in a single move

Achievements.name: Super Cross
Achievements.description: Eliminate the same block in three directions in a single move

Achievements.name: Double Double
Achievements.description: Eliminate at least 6 blocks in two lines in a single move

Achievements.name: Tetris?
Achievements.description: Eliminate at least 12 blocks in four lines in a single move

Achievements.name: High Five
Achievements.description: Eliminate at least five lines in a single move

Achievements.name: Hexapus
Achievements.description: Eliminate at least six lines in a single move

Achievements.name: Filled Just Right
Achievements.description: Have the board filled to around half

Achievements.name: Upside Down
Achievements.description: Have the first block in queue equals to the last block
